title: If you could permaban one person in each lane, who would it be?

replies.body: Everything the same except for mid, {{champion:245}}

{{champion:10}} everywhere

Fuck her and fuck people who play her
bann what you think is the most threat full champ  , the rest outa 130 champs  see wich champ you can counter ez in lane or in team fights  who will be your focus ? depend on how your team reacts
